page.title: 16WERRINGTON CRICKET CLUB.
page.content: In 1967 the club entered the Cornwall Cricket League and in 1971 a second X1 was formed.In 1985 a third team was formed also a very successful policy for the youth. The late Ron Furse was match secretary for many years and did a great amount of work on the ground. Mr.G.Walters,recently retired as Club Secretary after 25 years,was presented with an inscribed silver tray in appreciation of work done. The present X1,under Vic.Voyzey, were'runners up' in the Cornwall Senior League in 1984. 1985 has been one of the most successful years for the club. The 1st.X1 came third in their league,the 2nd.X1 won their league, the 3rd. team came fourth.The under 14's & 15's won their leagues respectively.When the sons of some of the current members join the club they will be third generation players.
